name: Glenda Cole
comment: I purchased the Bogner Goldfinger 45 about a year ago from the folks @ TGS, my first intro to Bogner was with a Line 6/Bogner tubed modelling amp, it worked well but I wanted more of an authentic tube sound. The Bogner Goldfinger 45 is much more then a typical 2 channel amp.

name: Bill Gates
comment: Thank you to your shop for adjusting my Taylor MINI GS. I love learning to play on it and since your shop adjusted it I love playing on it even more.

name: Makwins
comment: I received my tracking number and wednesday early afternoon I receive the instrument in Montreal, Quebec, very well packed, and in perfect condition. This is crazy.

name: John
comment: I received my PRS. It is in perfect condition and I am very happy with it. I actually just did a gig with it and it was amazing.

name: Vinsenjo
comment: Thank you to the folks at TheGuitarShop. Arrived on the expected delivery date. Packaging was excellent. No damage found as yet. Don't expect any either. Excellent sounding guitar, very pleased

name: Alexa
comment: I've just received my Les Paul and am delighted with it. Well-packed and swiftly delivered to me here in England. I would happily buy another guitar from The Guitar Shop.
